basics.name: Suraj Karakulath
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: A marketer turned data scientist with a penchant for creativity and problem solving.

work.name: Constructor Technology Group
work.summary: Finished a 6-week internship as part of my Masters degree, working in the Product team responsible for the Alemira LMS, and continued the engagement on a part-time basis after that.

work.name: Google
work.summary: Managed the Digital Guru agency certification program, defining product messaging with Global Product Leads, creating content in collaboration with internal subject matter experts, product owners, data scientists and external media production agencies.
